plugin.name: mume_macros
plugin.author: Nick Stockton
plugin.purpose: Defines keyboard macros to be used while playing mume.

muclient.script: Accelerator("Alt+C", "north") Accelerator("Alt+T", "south") Accelerator("Alt+N", "east") Accelerator("Alt+H", "west") Accelerator("Alt+G", "up") Accelerator("Alt+R", "down") Accelerator("Alt+S", "room_name") Accelerator("ctrl+shift+M", "assist") Accelerator("ctrl+shift+B", "bash")
